about.title: Driven by Engineering Excellence
about.p1: I'm a backend developer focused on Java and Spring Boot, complemented with Node.js experience. I'm passionate about designing systems that scale and remain maintainable.
about.p2: My training as a Systems Analyst gave me a solid foundation in software architecture, databases, and development best practices. I apply this knowledge to every project, prioritizing clean code and well-structured solutions.
about.p3: I have hands-on experience with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and AWS services. I understand that good code is just one part: deployment, monitoring, and maintenance are equally important.
